attributes.action: create marine conservation areas, set fishing quotas and save the blue fin tuna
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to the End of the Line documentary, we are petitoning for our government to take an active role in making the seas sustainable for our children and our future...our proposed solution is recommended by the end of the line documentary and includes setting up marine conservation areas where fishing is not allowed, establishing conservative fishing quotas and saving the blue fin tuna.
